title: Application of business corporation act
context: ยง415A-27 Application of business corporation act. The provisions of chapter 414, shall apply to professional corporations, except to the extent that the provisions are inconsistent with this chapter. [L 1985, c 259, pt of ยง1; am L 1987, c 135, ยง131; am L 2002, c 40, ยง52]
